name: Vincula
description: Vincula is an adventure solo game in which you will play the role of a newcomer to that word. Entering there and facing all its miseries will be your goal. Explore the different biomes that you'll find around The Village, fight against all kind of enemies and meet their charismatic characters. To do this, you will have a whole arenal of unique weapons and the possibility of improving your level training with The village Shaman. Will you be able to discover the secret that Vincula holds?
